author: axic3354
content:
Our my main update is that the test suite update from cancun to prague is mostly complete, and will start on the opcode reassignment work.

A number of the pending evmone PRs were merged.

The past ~2 weeks we have busy working on evmmax (ecrecover impl. specifically), and this coming week a number of people are on holidays.

author: gcolvin
content: Hello.  I just had a conversation on the EOF call with a Vyper team member whose name I didn't make note of.  Please get in touch.

author: gcolvin
content: Part of the conversation was about why the requirement for constant stack depth is necessary.  I had a hard time explaining, but I think it's fundamental to how validation works.
